reviewText: How can you make history the new favorite subject for your kids ?  Get these fact-filled but fun videos !
Great tool for teaching world history for once instead of everything geared towards US history, need a non-regional DVD player though, order one of those too.

Bad buyer!!!!!  buyer originally listed as US DVD. Its not and now they have changed the description and Im stuck with 6 DVDs we cannot watch. we discovered this series when we were in Scotland last summer. this is a hysterical & educational series. Wish we could watch them.
Bought it for my grandson,he loved it and thought it was very funny.
